A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Seriously\, how much does Disney pay these professional reviewers?\n91%? Did you accidentally walk into the Joker\, and somehow thought you were watching Episode 9? This was a muddled ball of derp\, visually stunning (of course) but as idiotic...if not more than the last. Save your money\, wait for it to drop on D+ in a few months...and at that time you can wish that Star Wars had not gone out like Game of Thrones did.
